short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggles debug_mode=true/false in the URL and refreshes the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is for Bubble.io users who hate having to always type debub=true or remove or change to false, etc. I have made a chrome extension that allows you to do this with two clicks.
